channel.title: Ann Hanson on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Ann Hanson on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: 2015 Skywarn training
item.description: After three or four years of planning to get Skywarn training, this year I finally did it. The good folks at Washtenaw County Emergency Operations Center and at the National Weather Service in White Lake, MI did a training session at Pioneer High School. The class was concurrent with a Michigan ballroom dancing competition so there was music and festivities and accomplished looking dancers to enjoy before the class. I was there with John Hritz KD8MKE and Ann Hanson.
